text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
O-Okay, back up a sec. 
What did you just say……?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
"Hey, hey, Nature! 
Come and chat with us～!"

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
"We can talk about marvelous☆ 
things perfect for you～★"

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Uh-huh, yeah, but after that. What was it you wanted to talk about?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: H-Hmmmm～? Did I really hear that right? Can you repeat it one more time?
